attributes.action: Make it a legal requirement that all tradespersons become qualified!
attributes.additional_details: * Including an employee of that person.
attributes.background: Make a legal requirement that 1) any person* who carries out, or offers to carry out, a trade service in or around the home, has gained a relevant recognised qualification 2) the organisation issuing the qualification enters that person's details and qualification into an online public register.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure what you mean by "tradesperson", so we don't know what specific action you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to take. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking Government or Parliament to make it a legal requirement that specific tradespersons, such as plumbers or plasterers, have to be qualified.
